domainSchemaId.description:
The schema ID of the objects we will be dealing with in this
workflow. Object IDs will be passed into workflow
processEvent. Objects matching schema and ID are automatically
loaded when workflow events are processed.

identityDocument.title: Identity document name (ex: aadhar, passport, etc)

batchId.title: Batch ID
batchId.description: The unique identifier for the product batch

paidCapital.title: Paid up share capital (Rs in lakhs)

marketPlace.title: Marketplace
marketPlace.description: Market Place, where farm output is presently sold

depth.description: In case of type - borewell, the depth of the well

location.title: Mark the location of the power source

category.description: Type of crop - Main, Inter, Border, Mixed, etc.

totalFarmingExperienceYears.title: Total years of experience in farming

organicFarmingExperienceYears.title: Total years of experience in organic farming

bankDocument.title: Upload document proof of the account

surveyNumber.title: Unique land parcel identification number(s)/land parcel survey no(s)

passbookNumber.title: Land parcel official document/pattadar passbook number

landOwnershipDocument.title: Upload land parcel official document/pattadar passbook
landOwnershipDocument.description: Upload land parcel official document/pattadar passbook

landGovtMap.title: Upload land parcel map document by govt.
landGovtMap.description: Upload land parcel map document by govt.

distanceFromServiceRoad.title: Distance from the service road (in km)

soilBenficialHarmfulMicrobialMassReport.title: Soil beneficial and harmful microbial mass report
soilBenficialHarmfulMicrobialMassReport.description: Soil beneficial and harmful microbial mass report
